shortdesc.ph: A FILENAME is a reference to a file.
A FILENAME can take the form of a simple file name, a relative file path, or an absolute file path.

section.p: ConTeXt will perform a limited search through the filesystem to try to find the file.

link.desc: Placeholders in this documentation are parts of commands that can be specified by the user. Placeholders come in types; some commands require particular types of variables as input.
